import re

def replace_word(s, t, r):
    t = re.escape(t)
    pattern = re.compile(f'{t}\\b')
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, r, s)
    return new_s

import re

def replace_word(s, t, r):
    t = re.escape(t)
    pattern = re.compile(f'\\b{t}')
    new_s = re.sub(pattern, r, s)
    return new_s
